page.title: 08RAILWAY BANK
page.content:
Behind Coronation Grove are some garages and behind them is an old railway bank.This railway used to run to Kings Lynn and Dereham.In the late 1960's it was torn up and the platform and station left to decay.
At the moment there are a lot of stinging nettles,bramble bushes and trees.The council and Youth Opportunity Scheme are cleaning it up and trying to make it into a beautiful walkway for people and for walking their dogs. Altogether its about a mile long and connects up with a caravan park which is near to the A47 going to Kings Lynn just outside Swaffham.
